sentence.Network_en: The beams are riddled with woodworm.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些木梁被蛀虫蛀得都是洞。

sentence.Network_en: The house had got woodworm and rising damp.
sentence.Network_cn: 房子有蛀虫,而且有返潮.

sentence.Network_en: Woodworm had eaten into most of the furniture.
sentence.Network_cn: 木蛀虫把大部份家具都蛀了.

entry.def: Woodworm are very small creatures which make holes in wood by eating it.

entry.tran: （尤指房子木建部分或家具的）木蛀虫害，木蠹虫害
entry.def: Woodworm is damage caused to wood, especially to the wooden parts of a house or to furniture, by woodworm making holes in the wood.

example.ex: ...treating the ground floor of a house for woodworm.
example.tran: 处理房子一层的木蛀虫害

sentences.en: The house had got woodworm and rising damp.
sentences.cn: 房子有蛀虫，而且有返潮。

sentences.en: Woodworm had eaten into most of the furniture.
sentences.cn: 木蛀虫把大部份家具都蛀了。

sentences.en: You need to treat this wood for woodworm.
sentences.cn: 你需要对这种木头进行处理以防蛀虫。
